text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, dusti hamroze ƣajr az hamdinoni xud magired, ki digaron az hec fasode dar xaqqi sumo kutohi namekunand va xostori rancu masaqqati sumojand. Va dusmani az guftorason oskor ast va on kina, ki dar dil dorand, ʙestar ast az on ci ʙa zaʙon meovarand. Ojotro ʙarojaton oskor soxtem, agar ʙa aql darjoʙed
